content:
Everybody has dislikes. Mine are a bit crazy and slightly embaressing. Here they are:

  • Algorithms that are only accurate within a certain parameter range.
  • Power Outages.
  • Swearing.
  • Simplified software that makes you think the developers of it think everybody is dumb.
  • Losing your work after you worked so long on it.
  • Minuets, when they're played so slow that it seems like a bunch of depressing chords and it never seems to end.
  • My asthma.
  • Nights when you wake up every 5 minutes.
  • Advertisements (especially in-text ads)
  • When someone copies you and takes credit for it (only when)

As you see, I have a lot of dislikes. Try making your own list and include everything.
title: Dislikes
